data.message: encore and relapse were trash,but now his music is coming back on track like between 1999-2003

replies.message: There's some gems in both of those albums. But in general yes they aren't the same quality.
relapse is by far one of his best
He says it himself..."that last relapse CD was (sound effect meaning mediocre)"

"At last relapse cd was (aaaach) perhaps i probaly ran the maxiums into the ground relax i aint going back to that now, all im tryin to say is get back clic clak pow cause i aint playing around its a game called circle ,im way to up to back down"   -thats in not affraid so yes i know what he says but still one of his best

Beta ghar jaa. Relapse was dope as fuck. Same Song and Dance, Bagpipes from baghdad, deja vu, beautiful, crack a bottle.... You call this trash ? Lol. Typical 14 year old retard who goes by the opinion of mainstream audience.
Its 3am in the morning, bodies laying all over the floor and i dont remember how they got there, I mustve killed them, killed them^^

The lyrics go "That last Relapse CD was Eh, perhaps I ran them ACCENTS into the ground"

Because he has an accents in   most of relapse.
Even he admitted it was the worst album he made
The relapse albumm is fucking dope u mf dont kno shit lol. And encore too. all of his albums are legendary
Relapse has some pretty good songs, and I loved encore
Zachariah Fumbles Celentano you incorrectly quoted Not Afraid
